Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Ampicillin
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with added Ampicillin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci, with specific submission for Ampicillin addition at defined concentrations.
